0.0: When not on the field for more than 6s, Max HP will be increased by 20% and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 80. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 6s.

1.0: When not on the field for more than 6s, Max HP will be increased by 25% and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 100. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 6s.

2.0: When not on the field for more than 6s, Max HP will be increased by 30% and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 120. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 6s.

3.0: When not on the field for more than 6s, Max HP will be increased by 35% and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 140. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 6s.

4.0: When not on the field for more than 6s, Max HP will be increased by 40% and Elemental Mastery will be increased by 160. These effects will be canceled after the wielder has been on the field for 6s.
